Server Configuration
Before June 3

Master server
CPU: Intel Xeon 64 core
RAM: 256 Gb
Disk : 4000 Gb SSD
Network: 200 Mbps Bgp multi-line
Dual-node backup
info.zh_CN:
服务器配置
Before June 3

Master server
CPU: Intel Xeon 64 core
RAM: 256 Gb
Disk : 4000 Gb SSD
Network: 200 Mbps Bgp multi-line
Dual-node backup

Backup server
CPU: Dual Intel Xeon 32 core
RAM: 256 Gb
Disk: 500Gb hard disk + 10 Tb 7200 hard disk (dynamic increase when needed)
Network: 200 Mbps Bgp multi-line

After June 3

Master server
CPU: Intel Xeon 64 core
RAM: 1024 Gb
Disk: 4000 Gb SSD
Network: 200 Mbps Bgp multi-line
Dual-node backup

Backup server
CPU: Dual Intel Xeon 32 core
RAM: 1024 Gb
Disk: 500Gb hard disk + 10 Tb 7200 hard disk (dynamic increase when needed)
Network: 200 Mbps Bgp multi-line

Full-node server
CPU: Dual Intel Xeon 32 core
RAM: 1024 Gb
Disk: 512 Gb SSD
Network: 200 Mbps Bgp multi-line
团队介绍
EOS Beijing将与大学合作研究项目和各种区块链社区团体,支持EOS-related学术研究和促进EOS意识和采用。的支持与合作交流、账户、cryptocurrency媒体,和其他元素的生态系统,我们将能够对EOS的成功做出了重大贡献。
数据来源：EOS小助手小程序
